messages.sign_up_with: If you are a UW affiliate, please sign up with your UW NetID.  Otherwise, sign up with a username of your choice.
messages.sign_in_with: If you created your map account with your UW NetID, please select that option.  Otherwise, sign in with the username that you chose when creating your map account.

receive-newsletter.label: Newsletter
receive-newsletter.description: I would like to receive the data science @ uw newsletter.

receive-updates.label: Updates
receive-updates.description: I would like to be informed of Data Science Institute events.

lunch-random.label: lunch.random
lunch-random.description: Sign up for lunch.random, our initiative that randomly pairs members of the data science at UW community for lunches to build connections and learn about each other's research.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.message: Welcome to the Community Map. We encourage you to set up your profile to make it easier for others to find you.  To edit your profile, just click the 'Edit My Profile' button at the top left. We hope you enjoy using the Community Map.
